data.name: Devil May Cry 5 - Gerbera GP01
data.detailed_description:
A special Devil Breaker inspired by the legendary creator Shoji Kawamori. Fires shockwaves from its five fingers, which can be controlled freely on the ground or in the air.

Note: this content is usable from mission 2 onwards. It cannot be used in Bloody Palace.
